title: Add member-only profile page for registered users

requirements.text: Create a backend function to store and retrieve user profile data including registration timestamp and user principal
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores user registration data with principal and timestamp
Backend provides a query function to retrieve the authenticated user's profile
Only authenticated users can access their own profile data

requirements.text: Create a ProfilePage component at route /profile that displays the authenticated user's information including when they registered

quotes: That profile page show only members

acceptanceCriteria: ProfilePage component is created and accessible at /profile route
Page displays user's Internet Identity principal
Page is only accessible to authenticated users
Unauthenticated users are prompted to log in via Internet Identity

requirements.text: Add a Profile navigation link in the Navigation component that is only visible to authenticated members
acceptanceCriteria: Profile link appears in navigation menu only when user is authenticated
Link is hidden when user is not logged in

requirements.text: Automatically register users in the backend when they first authenticate with Internet Identity
acceptanceCriteria: User registration is automatically created upon first authentication
Subsequent logins do not create duplicate registrations

constraints: Use Internet Identity for authentication - do not introduce third-party auth providers
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor.ts, main.tsx, or components/ui directory
nonGoals: Editable user profiles with custom fields
Admin dashboard to view all registered users
Email verification or additional registration forms
